name: Telekinesis
description: Move objects with the power of your mind.
effects: Can lift and manipulate objects up to (PSY/10) kg
Use as a weapon to deal 1d6 + PSY/10 damage
Requires concentration to maintain

name: Enhanced Telekinesis
description: More powerful version of Telekinesis with greater force and control.
effects: Can lift and manipulate objects up to (PSY/5) kg
Use as a weapon to deal 2d6 + PSY/5 damage
Can perform precision manipulations like lockpicking
Requires concentration to maintain

name: Mind Shield
description: Create a mental barrier that protects against psionic attacks.
effects: +20 resistance to psionic intrusion
Automatically alerts you to psionic probing
Can be extended with additional mana cost (1 per hour)

name: Telepathy
description: Communicate mentally with another sentient being.
effects: Establish two-way mental communication
Target can resist with PSY check
Language barriers still apply

name: Psionic Blast
description: Project a focused burst of psionic energy at a target.
effects: Deals 3d6 + PSY/5 mental damage
Target can resist with PSY check to halve damage
Can cause disorientation (-5 to all checks for 1d4 rounds)

name: Psychometry
description: Read psychic impressions from an object or location.
effects: Gain insights about the object's history and previous owners
Reveal emotional events connected to the object
Information clarity depends on success level of PSY check

name: Pyrokinesis
description: Create and control fire with your mind.
effects: Ignite flammable objects
Create a flame burst dealing 3d8 fire damage
With concentration, control existing flames

name: Mind Control
description: Take control of another being's actions.
effects: Target follows basic commands
Target can resist with PSY check
Self-destructive commands grant target +20 to resistance check
Target remembers being controlled afterward

name: Precognition
effects: Gain insight into potential outcomes of a specific action
Multiple possible futures may be revealed
Clarity depends on success level of PSY check
Future is not fixed and can change based on actions taken

name: Psionic Healing
description: Channel psionic energy to heal physical injuries.
effects: Heal 2d8 + PSY/5 HP
Can stabilize a dying character
Cannot heal critical injuries or disease
